review: The first one we bought wouldn't stay connected. After reading some reviews and realizing it was a problem with some I called Amazon. They were wonderful. The sent a replacement and a return slip for the first one. I could leave the connector on the TV and keep the remote. I only returned the stick. I got the replacement in a couple days and it worked perfectly. Now we have one in the bedroom and well as our Fire TV in the living room. Thank you Amazon!

review: Wow.  It works great!!  The user interface is fantastic...very Apple-esque.  The fire stick itself looks like a long USB thumb drive with an HDMI connection instead.  It plugs into an HDMI plug on your TV & you control it with a small remote.  The small remote only has 4 buttons with obvious functions, plus a jog dial.  Very easy to navigate the onscreen menu and the interface is very easy to navigate.  I do agree with other reviews that's it's really annoying how Amazon mixes together the "free with Prime" shows in with the shows you have to pay for.  More than once I've picked a show I want to watch & then realize it's an extra charge.  The fire stick itself is wonderful and easy to use with loads of streaming services available directly from the menu.  Highly recommend!
